title: Karnataka govt may monetise land to raise resources to support expenditures resulting from 'guarantees'
selftext: Reminder: Free guarantees are actually not free
comments:
Promises of free things are slowly poising our government Financials, all levels but particularly at state.

This isn't a BJP vs other thing, as all parties indulge in it.
